casebody.data:
IN RE: ACCUTANE LITIGATION (Angelo Annuzzi-Cross-Petitioner) C-390 September Term 2017
079933 Supreme Court of New Jersey. December 8, 2017

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A cross-petition for certification of the judgment in A-4760-44 and A-164-15 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the cross-petition for certification is granted.
